title: Once again No xp after game
body: The first time it was understandable (even though I don't agree) my computer crashed in the middle of a game and even though i came back,finished strong and won. The game thought I was a leaver. This 2nd game was a match of aram as shen with no hiccups finished the match and when I skipped the waiting for results page after the match I got no xp.

replies.body:
It was the match as Shen like I said in the first post, heres a link to the match in question.
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2644873520/201434372?tab=overview

I did not  receive xp idk why I think its a bug.

edit: I got a bit impatient when I made this thread I already had an open ticket ,my apologies but my issue has been resolve but I did read someone else having similar issues just wanted to bring it to your guys attention.
I have 4 games in the last 20 games that have no xp gains. 1 is a win... rito oh rito... wtf.

That's pretty weird that you couldn't see how much XP you got from that ARAM match. I think I found the one you were worried about, the ARAM match where you were Zilean? Looks like this one did give you XP even if you couldn't see it, you got 154 XP for that game.

According to my match history 3 games in the last 20 played I received 0 xp. The 3 games are all defeated games, over 25 mins and i didn't afk at any point. my xp bar also has not moved after these games. 

8/12/17 40 min game
8/12/17 26 min game
9/12/17 33 min game
